short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances your experience on the student portal for COMSATS University

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This add-on gets data from the CMS and calculates your GPA, internal marks etc. so you don't have to. Also has a dark mode for the CMS. Right now it has the following features:
1- Themes for CMS
2- Calculate internal marks
3- Calculate GPA for each semester individually
4- Block annoying popup messages

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.4:

- Mark summary marks now show in tables instead of text
- Mark summary along with calculated marks can be downloaded as a text file be pressing the save as text file button
- There are more options available for mark calculation along with internal marks (click on extension button to access)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.3:

- Added Support for Midterm Marks Calculation
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.2:

- Added Themes
  - Use dark and light Themes (old dark mode is removed)
  - Create your own Themes
  - Share your Themes
  - Change Themes from the popup

- Added Support for more campuses
  - Lahore Campus
  - Attock Campus
  - Sahiwal Campus
  - Vehari Campus
  - Wah Campus
